publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-147# Dr Elaine Murray: Foot-and-Mouth Disease Recovery Fundingâ€”That the Parliament notes the excellent use made by Dumfries and Galloway and Scottish Borders tourist boards of the additional funding allocated to them by the Scottish Executive, through VisitScotland, to help the tourism industry recover from the effects of the outbreak of foot-and-mouth disease and considers that VisitScotland should release the third and final tranche of this funding.
S2M-147# Foot-and-Mouth Disease Recovery Funding (lodged on 13 June 2003) Pauline McNeill*, Phil Gallie*, David Mundell*, Chris Ballance*
S2M-147# Foot-and-Mouth Disease Recovery Funding (lodged on 13 June 2003) Mike Watson*, Jeremy Purvis*, Alex Fergusson*
S2M-147# Foot-and-Mouth Disease Recovery Funding (lodged on 13 June 2003) Mr Adam Ingram*, Alasdair Morgan*
